mapper.select: SELECT tbpost.id ,tbpost.created_at as createdAt ,tbpost.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbpost.deleted ,tbpost.tbuser_id as tbuserId ,tbpost.title ,tbpost.cate ,tbpost.content ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(deleted)', tbuser.nick) as tbuserNick ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '', tbuser.mpic) as tbuserMpic FROM tbpost, tbuser WHERE tbpost.tbuser_id = tbuser.id AND tbpost.id = #{id}
